Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror

notes.text: Archfiends are very solid right now. Chaos hunter is mandatory with the amount of Amazoness in the game right now, run at least 2 of them. SK is great to stop OTKs and econ take plays and also is fodder for Call of the Archfiend. If you have Lyla obviously play her over Jain. Card Trooper is very risky and not worth it IMO. Hope this helps anyone that wants to play this fun archetype.
